Text:
Hmm Im new to this :)
Which format should I use then?
Why not? It's a superior format for files at this size.

My translation from russia to english will be finnish very soon. I use a translation program so all text are little odd, but every dialog will be in english... better bad english then in russia. :)
So within a couple of hours it will be finnish.
Hope all downloaders will enjoy it, I did so far :)

I finish my translation a sec ago. 
Age of Pirates Translation.
Enjoy!

If you change language.ini your mainmenu screen gonna be fucked up. Better to copy english content into russian folder. Thats my experiance btw :).
I added instruction in my file how to do it, so there should not be any problems then.

OK!! :)
Didnt work for me, but I played AoP with patch 1.3 and 1.41
Nice upload although i dont really need this i made it english manually without any problem.

Knaster!?
Did you edit all dialogs to perfect english or do mean just all menus?
i applyed your stuff and now my game crashs before it gets to the menu.

Alright Intetnetrage.
Sorry cant help you with that. I installed everything for 2 of my friends, same thing happens there. I have no answer why. BUT, try only v1.3. Cant use my language translation but menus should work in english. If you can w8 to the end of this month, there maybe a english release to download. 12th sep realease date at western market. Othervise go for 1.3.
